meaningMnemonic: The <radical>roof</radical> that became the <radical>origin</radical> of all roofs was <kanji>perfect</kanji>. It was tall and wide so it could fit and protect everyone. And the dimensions were perfect too.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>perfect</kanji> roof was commissioned by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん). We got all of the carpenters and home makers and construction workers he'd conquered together and tasked them with making the first roof, but only if they made it absolutely perfect.
